item.description:
Our next meeting is on Tuesday, August 10th at 7 PM in the Lounge in the SENIOR CENTER on 49 Pleasant Street off READING SQUARE.

I HAVE CHANGED THE DATE TWICE TO AUGUST 10 IN THE EDITING FEATURE BUT IT STILL CAME UP THE SEVENTEETH???? THE DATE IS THE 10TH!!

We will be having an open forum. Come with your suggestions, concerns and comments. We will be here to support each other and to help everyone achieve a new level of health.
E-mail me at btzee6@gmail.com if you want to present any findings or interesting information at the meeting.

My new schedule for now has me coming to Reading every five weeks. I have tried to change the automatic meetup schedule 3 times now and the second Tuesday of each month still comes up. I am trying to change this permanently but just remember my new schedule and call me if you are confused until this is fixed. I can be reached at 623-251-7547 or 617-943-5570. Sorry for the continuing confusion.

thanks.

See you next week.
Betsy

Donations for meetup expenses and room rental are always gratefully accepted.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the one with the briefcase and all the papers in front of me.
item.name: The Reading Fibromyalgia Recovery Group Meetup
